messages.message: Hey, this is a good example of provenance information being very wrong. I believe its focusing on some words present in the response instead of areas relating to the revenue currency e.g. the revenue number with $ symbol, or business address in US. Project here (https://aihub.instabase.com/build/01939bb7-0a19-7586-8903-1103c95d2c3a)
@Nikolaos Kofinas would you be most familiar with build provenance?
Something about this field is particularly bad - see other examples

> I believe its focusing on some words present in the response instead
Adding a potential (minor) example of this issue (see screenshot)
this is the provenance for the reasoning field whcih I am not familiar with, tagging @SÅ‚awek Biel @jordy.vlan which may be more helpful
cc: @lydia would this be something we can fix with the low hanging fruit improvements?
